text: parayuka: itinekkal sresthamayat ‎nanariyiccutaratteyea? bhakti pularttiyavarkk ‎tannalute nathanre atukkal talbhagattute ‎arukalealukunna svargiyaramannalunt. avaravite ‎sthiravasikalayirikkum. avarkkavite ‎parisud'dharaya inakalunt; oppam daivapritiyum. ‎allahu tanre atimakalute avasthakaleakke ‎kantariyunnavanan. ‎
